action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Copenhagen
TO: Athens
BY: Boat
CLASS: The cheapest
WHEN: On March 3

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you informed the travel agent about the place of departure? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No.

ME: Have you decided on the exact time of departure from Copenhagen? Please answer with the time in 24-hour format.

ASIDE: Not yet.

ME: What is your full name?

ASIDE: John Smith

ME: What is your email address?

ASIDE: john.smith@example.com

ME: What is your phone number?

ASIDE:
no
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your destination? Please answer yes or no.

NO

ME:  What is your preferred mode of transportation?

### Assistant:
Boat

ME:  What is your budget for this trip?

### Assistant:

ANSWER: No.

ANSWER: Boat.

ME: What is the class of travel you prefer?

ANSWER: The cheapest.
